Package org.w3c.jigsaw.frames

Class Summary
AsIsFrame Read the HTTP reply directly from a file.
CgiFrame Handle CGI scripts.
EncodingAttribute  
HTTPExtFrame  
HTTPFrame Default class to handle the HTTP protocol, manage FileResource and DirectoryResource.
JpegComFrame This class will read the comments from a jpeg file and return it depending on the Accept: header
JpegXMPFrame This class will read the XMP marker from a jpeg file and return it depending on the Accept: header
LanguageAttribute  
LatestChildRedirectFrame do an automatic redirect to the most recently modified container child
MimeTypeArrayAttribute  
MimeTypeAttribute The generic class of Mime type attributes.
NegotiatedFrame Content negotiation.
PostableFrame Handle POST.
RedirecterFrame Perform an internal redirect.
RelocateFrame Emit a HTTP redirect.
SeeOtherFrame generates a 303 See Other reply on a POST client should do the redirect with a GET
VirtualHostFrame For Virtual Hosting.
